website_summaries.verdict: The best of the best. A serious cooler for serious outdoor enthusiasts.
pros: Polyurethane insulation keeps ice frozen and items cold for up to 10 days
Press-and-pull latch keeps lid locked down in all positions
Built-in bottle opener and fish scale
Uses stainless steel hardware to make it rustproof
cons: It's not designed for the person on a budget

customer_reviews.title: I highly recommend that you also purchase the Winco 1/2 Size Pan ...
customer_reviews.text: Is a little bulky, but it keeps items cold as described. I have also used it to keep food hot. I highly recommend that you also purchase the Winco 1/2 Size Pan 2 1/2" to set inside the lip of cooler. It works awesome to hold utensils, spices or items you want to keep out of the ice.
customer_reviews.author: Jim R

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it. It has very thick insulation so ...
customer_reviews.text: Husband loves it. It has very thick insulation so the inside is smaller than the cooler of the same size but it makes up for it with how long it keeps the ice. I don't think it will keep the ice for 10 days as it claims in some reviews I've seen (especially since we open it quite frequently) but I don't have to replace it as frequently as the Coleman cooler that we replaced. We replaced the ice once in a week of use vs every two days. That's a huge difference.
customer_reviews.author: conscientious8

customer_reviews.title: Pelican far superior than Yeti.
customer_reviews.text: Sold my Yeti and moving on with Pelican. Ice last much longer and the build and quality is beyond belief. Plus even better, it's made in the USA. Most Yeti are not.
customer_reviews.author: GoHawks

customer_reviews.title: I holds 5 days worth of food and keeps it cool with just two of the pelican ice inserts
customer_reviews.text: My job in the military requires me to be out in the field for 5 days at a time. I could not survive without this cooler. I holds 5 days worth of food and keeps it cool with just two of the pelican ice inserts.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan M. Grier

customer_reviews.title: Love this cooler
customer_reviews.text: Love this cooler. Cheaper than a yeti, bigger than a yeti, and it has wheels! and real latches. Love it. Beer stays cold for days.
customer_reviews.author: Joey Cards

customer_reviews.title: So glad we purchased the Pelican
customer_reviews.text: We had a hard time deciding whether to get the Pelican cooler or the Yeti. So glad we purchased the Pelican! It really keeps the drinks and food cold for days and we really like the built in wheels.
customer_reviews.author: slyne

customer_reviews.title: Try an Orca
customer_reviews.text: As a premier cooler I am a little disappointed in it. The cooler leaked at the spout and on pelican's website they have a 9 step procedure to fix the problem. I suppose it is a normal issue. For paying so much you would think the cooler will be good out of the box without disassembling the spout and adding silicone. My cheap cooler doesn't leak and I didn't have to do anything to it. Half of the ice melted in 3.5 days indoors.
customer_reviews.author: steve

customer_reviews.title: 3 days for 20 lb. ice at 80 degrees
customer_reviews.text: With occasional opening on camping trips with typical 80 degree high temperatures - I get three days out of 20 lb ice. Acceptable.
customer_reviews.author: Monday Skipper

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What a cooler holds ice while opening and closing like you use a cooler about 4 to 5 days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t get it from the seller I did. They are a joke.
customer_reviews.text: Handle is kind of cheap. Seller was terrible. Does not come with central pelican sticker.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ice melts quickly
customer_reviews.text: Looks great but all ice melted in less than 24 hours. Was kept outside in shade on a 80 degree day with beers and frozen foods. YouTube vid that rated this was way off.
customer_reviews.author: shawn fisher

customer_reviews.title: Iike how ice lasts for days The Pelican is much ...
customer_reviews.text: Iike how ice lasts for days The Pelican is much heavier than Yeti and they’re equal in keeping items cold.
customer_reviews.author: grit

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler. Only problem is design flaw is drain cap. Holds block ice for days.
customer_reviews.author: George Smart

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic cooler. Buy it!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic cooler. Kept it's ice for 6 days while at a camping music festival. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Solid cooler
customer_reviews.text: So far so good, only a couple of uses but a very solid cooler. The handle and wheel kit are a must have. Very well built
customer_reviews.author: Markie5150

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t hold ice for even 2 days
customer_reviews.text: I’m very disappointed, I paid a lot of money for this ice chest and it literally doesn’t hold ice any longer than my old one, I had to put ice in every day and the outside temp was in the 60s and 70s, if I could send it back I would.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: love my new Wheelie cooler
customer_reviews.text: I love my Pelican. Purchased one for my son and he said filled it is heavy so having mine on whell wheels is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Cherie

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent! Just what I wanted. Durable wheels. Great choice plus my stickers look great and stick to the smooth surface. Not too heavy. Ice lasts!
customer_reviews.author: Marc D.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product and keeps ice longer than any other cooler I've owned. A bit heavy but great quality
customer_reviews.author: Pork and Beans

customer_reviews.title: best conventional cooler I ever owned
customer_reviews.text: A bit bulky but expected from a cooler that really holds the cold, max ice retention
customer_reviews.author: Ray Schwarz

customer_reviews.title: Amazingly Awesome
customer_reviews.text: The best investment in a cooler ever! I can't believe I waited this long to get one. Holds ice forever!
customer_reviews.author: William Brian

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Worked great could not imagine moving it without wheels keeps ice for bout 5-6 days full of beverages
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler. Did better than expected with a small ...
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler. Did better than expected with a small amount of dry ice and a small bag of cube ice. Kept products frozen for 4 days in Florida heat.
customer_reviews.author: Sb1973

customer_reviews.title: I'm disappointed. Yes
customer_reviews.text: For the price, I'm disappointed. Yes, it was August but I had to replace the ice after 3 days since it was all water. It performed better when it was completely full of beverages but overall for what we paid, I was underwhelmed. I do love the wheels and how easy it is to move.
customer_reviews.author: Mhunter865

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: they like it but said the handle is too short
customer_reviews.author: Christine Maxa

customer_reviews.title: Best Cooler that keeps ice!
customer_reviews.text: After a long period of research, comparing prices and the longevity of the ice over a period of days in the sun. The Pelican Elite Wheeled Cooler is the Best. We where contemplating if we should purchase the Wheeled Cooler. We are so happy that we did!! We use this 45 qrt cooler every weekend on our boat, love it. We where so tired of purchasing ice each day.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie Adam

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler. I don't have to buy another cooler ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice cooler. I don't have to buy another cooler for the rest of my day. Thanks guys very satisfied with your product works great
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Plain emblem
customer_reviews.text: Very sturdy reliable cooler! But a little upset that the cooler didn't look exactly like the photo. The pelican emblem is not colored on the one I recieved.
customer_reviews.author: Brittney Briana

customer_reviews.title: Expensive but worth it every dollar
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is great it keeps the ice a lot longer than traditional coolers, it work so good than you don't care how you pay for it. I toke it to 95 degrees for three days and the ice melt but a lot slower then regular coolers the bigger the ice the longer it last 100 % recommend you won't regret it period.
customer_reviews.author: Enrique Aguilar

customer_reviews.title: 45 Qt Wheeled Review
customer_reviews.text: Spent a lot of time looking for a "premium cooler" with wheels. Pelican makes one of the few available and I'm glad I bought it. Has a lot of available accessories for food storage which is really convenient. Overall this thing is built like a tank, the 45 Qt is bigger than I expected it to be. it weighs 37 pounds empty so I'm very happy to have the wheels to pull it around. Built in bottle opener and tie downs straps also get used all the time. Only area of improvement would be the handle. It only extends straight out and does not extend upwards at all. It's a little uncomfortable to pull and I'm only 6'
customer_reviews.author: Ryan Rhodes

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler. Didn't hold up with ice retention as ...
customer_reviews.text: Nice cooler. Didn't hold up with ice retention as expected. Did my own ice test with 40 lbs of ice and zip tying ithe lid shut. Day 6 I peaked in and all the ice was melted
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Do you like to keep things cold
customer_reviews.text: VALUE is what this is about! Do you like to keep things cold? WOW!
customer_reviews.author: David C.

customer_reviews.title: Got it for the bear
customer_reviews.text: No bear has tested it yet, but that is why I got it. So I'm still waiting on that. Pretty heavy and hefty. While the ice melts almost as fast in the pelican as in my 30 year old cooler, this one does maintain a coolness after melting that the old one does not. I'm not sure where pelican got their "10 days to melt" test results. perhaps the cooler was in Antarctica. Rolls well on solid ground. not sure how it will do on the beach, it's pretty heavy.
customer_reviews.author: BikeHike

customer_reviews.title: Why better than Yeti
customer_reviews.text: We almost got a yetI, however we really like the handles wheels and locks. their was a photo of the drink holder but thats not what they shipped. Great product. Harvy2017
customer_reviews.author: not a spell chick

customer_reviews.title: Works just like it says
customer_reviews.text: Great coolers and love the wheels which make it easier. My husband has even taken them on the airplane so it is great to have the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Nana

customer_reviews.title: The beast!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a beast. So glad it has wheels. It is large and take sup a good amount of room in our vehicles, but perfect for our needs!
customer_reviews.author: Mike

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! Better than all the other brands. The housing is a bit thick.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wright

customer_reviews.title: Just what I was looking for
customer_reviews.text: Cooler holds ice for days even in direct sunlight all the time. The rubber feet on the cooler are great at holding the cooler in place.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't see paying more for a Yeti
customer_reviews.text: Really sturdy and keeps ice for several days. The wheels are a real convenience and the handles seem to be very sturdy. Don't see paying more for a Yeti. This is a great value!
customer_reviews.author: Linda H Valls

customer_reviews.title: SWEEEEETTTT!
customer_reviews.text: Gorgeous Legit Cooler! Cannot be happier! LOVE THE WHEELS!!!! This cooler is so very sturdy as well. I can vouch for the ice test. 2 days and ice is still 75% solid.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn P

customer_reviews.title: Too bad my husband only uses it as a coffee table
customer_reviews.text: Quality cooler. Too bad my husband only uses it as a coffee table.
customer_reviews.author: M. Botha

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy well built cooler
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy well built cooler, wheels are great and a must have for as heavy as it is. Holding time for a 10lb bag of ice is about three days. I was expecting a little more inside volume for as big as it is. Over all I am very pleased
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Ashabraner

customer_reviews.title: Cooler was inside the house and held a 20 bag ...
customer_reviews.text: Cooler was inside the house and held a 20 bag of ice for 5 days. Not sure what conditions are supposed to be to last 10 days. Inside bottom of cooler in not flat.
customer_reviews.author: Scott McWhorter

customer_reviews.title: Of course this is a great cooler and keeps items cold for a long time
customer_reviews.text: Of course this is a great cooler and keeps items cold for a long time. My only issue is the weight. I knew the empty weight when I order it and realized with ice etc it would be very heavy, which is why it had to have wheels for me. However, when it's full, I need a second person to get it up to my pickup truck bed.
customer_reviews.author: POLI

customer_reviews.title: It's all cool now.
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler. Don't load it up before loading it up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Truly disappointed in the cooler it's claim was to keep ICE ...
customer_reviews.text: Truly disappointed in the cooler it's claim was to keep ICE for 10 days. I cooled it down like it said it would not hold 2 days I had to put 10 lbs every day to have ice. I should have bought another Yukon it sat next to this and held all week.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product but doesnt come as appears
customer_reviews.text: Cooler doesnt come as it appears. No pelican or USA sticker. Wheels and clasps are grey instead of red. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well built and very reasonable price for the quality ...
customer_reviews.text: Very well built and very reasonable price for the quality. However, I ordered too large and had to return. Got dinged for shipping and a restocking fee. Be sure to order the correct size the FIRST time.
customer_reviews.author: F Mackey Schneider

customer_reviews.title: I wish I hadn't wasted my money or trusted this seller
customer_reviews.text: I purchased the Pelican to replace an old Coleman. I've been using them side by side for a couple of weeks and the Coleman keeps ice longer than the expensive Pelican (even when following the manufacturers instructions). I've requested to return the pelican, but the seller doesn't pay for the return shipping (and this thing weighs a lot) and charges up to 50% to restock! I wish I hadn't wasted my money or trusted this seller!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Pelican cooler a flop,don't trust the reviews
customer_reviews.text: I was so disappointed and ashamed of myself for buying this cooler,just came back from a camping trip of four days,told my friends about this cooler,the ice melted down in three days,I bought the ice the day before the trip. The cooler is heavy to roll around,so I guess I just have to bite the bullet and use it as a seat,I didn't tell my friends the price. Can't trust all the reviews I read.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: We Love this cooler. We haven't used it yet but we love the cooler
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Rodriguez

product_meta.title: Pelican Products ProGear Elite Wheeled Cooler
product_meta.description:
•Up to 10 days ice retention*, freezer grade gasket, 2"" polyurethane insulation
•Built-in Bottle Opener


You will never need another cooler (unless you want one of our other sizes.) Our engineers have crafted the toughest mobile cold storage unit possible, with no detail overlooked. Reinforced corners and thick walls insulate better for longer ice retention while protecting from impact. Superiror stainless steel hardware and built-in UV resistance protect for a lifetime. And that's not even getting into specifics. Test one for a lifetime and see. Engineered to last.

•Press & Pull Latches (Wide for Gloved Use)
•Molded-In Tie Downs
•Non-Skid & Non-Marking Raised Feet
•Molded-In Lock Hasp, Stainless Steel Plate
•Sloped Drain & Tethered Threaded Plug (Garden Hose Attachable)
•Corrosion Resistant Stainless Steel Hardware
•Integrated Fish Scale on Lid
•Molded-In handles with built in trolley handle
•Heavy duty wheels
•Guaranteed for life
•Made in USA
•*Ice retention - Initial test results are based on the Pelican 65Qt Elite Cooler model.
Testing was conducted using forced air circulation in a temperature controlled environmental chamber at 90 degrees F. The test specimens were loaded to capacity with c

•Custom Color Program
Pelican ProGear is proud to announce our bear resistant certification from the Interagency Grizzly Bear Committee.

The purpose of this certification is to help keep bears safe and significantly reduce bear-human encounters by ensuring that bears do not have access and become conditioned to anthropogenic foods and other bear attractants that increase these encounters.

This certification involves intense impact and penetration testing by use of visual inspection, mechanical methods and captive Grizzly Bear testing over extended periods of time.

 **Pelican ProGear Elite Coolers are certified bear-resistant by the IGBC under certification numbers 3365, 3366, 3373, 3374, 3375, 3376

Body: Polyethylene Latch: ABS
feature_bullets: Up to 10 days ice retention, freezer grade gasket, 2" polyurethane insulation
Built in trolley handle with molded-in handles
Press & Pull Latches (Wide for Gloved Use)
